column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Ikonium so wɔkɔr Jewfo nhyiamudan no mu
column3: na wɔkɛkaa asɛm ma Jewfo nye Griikfo nyimpadodow pii gyee dzii."

column2: "Na Jewfo asoɔdzenfo no kenyaan amanamamfo no
column3: na wɔmaa wonyaa adwen bɔn wɔ enuanom no ho."

column2: "Na dɛm ntsi wɔtsenaa hɔ kyɛree
column3: na wɔkasaa ndam do wɔ Ewuradze mu
column4: na no so dzii n'adom asɛm no ho dase
column5: na ɔnam hɔn nsa do yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze."

column2: "Na kurow no mu nyimpadodow no mu paae
column3: na ɔfa dzii Jewfo no afa
column4: na ɔfa so dzii asomafo no afa."

column2: "Na amanamamfo nye Jewfo nye hɔn etsitsir bɔɔ kyirididi baa dɛ wɔrobɔbɔ hɔn adapaa na woesiw hɔn abo no
column4: "wohunii na woguanee kɔr Likaonia nkurow Listra nye Derbe nye asaase a oehyia hɔ no do:"

column2: "na hɔ na wɔkɛkaa asɛmpa no."
"Na Listra hɔ ɔbarimba bi tse hɔ a ne nan mu nnyɛ dzen
column3: ɔyɛ obubuafo fi ne na yamu a ɔnnantseew da."

column2: "Ɔno na Paul rekasa no otsiee no. Na Paul dze
column3: ɔdze n'enyi tsiim no do
column4: na ohun dɛ ɔwɔ gyedzi dɛ no ho bɛsan no
column7: Soɛr gyina wo nan do tsentsen. Na ohuruhuruwii na ɔnantsewee."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow no hun dza Paul ayɛ no
column3: wɔmaa hɔn ndze do kae wɔ Likaonia kasa mu dɛ
column4: Enyame eyiyi hɔnho dɛ nyimpa esiansian aba hɛn nkyɛn."

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ Barnabas Zeus
column3: nye Paul Hermes
column4: osiandɛ ɔno nye ɔsɛnkafo tsitsir no."

column2: "Na Zeus a ɔwɔ kurow no enyim no sɔfoe dze anantwinyin nye nhyiren katraka baa kurow no n'abowano
column3: dɛ ɔnye nyimpadodow no robɔbɔ afɔr."

column2: "Na asomafo Barnabas nye Paul tsee no
column3: wosunsuaan hɔn ntar mu
column4: na wotutuu mbirika kɔdɔɔ nyimpadodow no mu"

column2: "tseaa mu dɛ
column3: Mbarimba
column4: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom reyɛ yinom yi? Hɛn so yɛyɛ hom saso nyimpa dɛ homara
column5: na yɛka asɛmpa kyerɛ hom dɛ hom ndan mfi egyangyandze yi ho nkɔ tseasefo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn: ɔno na ɔbɔɔ sor nye asaase nye po

column2: "ɔno na mbersantsen a oebotwa mu no
column3: ɔmaa amanaman nyina kwan dɛ wɔnnantsew hɔnankasa hɔn akwan mu."

column2: "Naaso oenngyaa no ho adasedzi
column3: dɛ ɔyɛɛ ayamuyie
column4: na ɔdze nsu fii sor maa hom
column6: na ɔdze edziban nye abotɔyamu hyɛɛ hom akoma ma."

column2: "Na nsɛm a wɔkae nyina ekyir no
column3: wɔfonae ansaana worutum esiw nyimpadodow no kwan dɛ mma wɔmmbɔ afɔr mma hɔn."

column2: "Na Jewfo bi fii Antiok nye Ikonium baa hɔ
column3: na wɔwee guu nyimpadodow no aso mu ma wosiiw Paul abo
column4: na wɔtwee no fiir kurow no mu a nna wosusu dɛ oewu."

column2: "Na esuafo no begyinaa no ho hyiae no
column3: ɔsoɛree na ɔkɔr kurow no mu; na adze kyee no ɔnye Barnabas fii hɔ kɔr Derbe."

column2: "Na wɔkaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ kurow no na wɔyɛɛ dodowara esuafo no
column3: wɔsanee baa Listra
column7: na wotutuu hɔn fo dɛ wɔntsena gyedzi no mu
column8: na afei so otwar dɛ yedua ahohia pii mu kɔ Nyankopɔn ahenman no mu."

column2: "Na wɔhyehyɛɛ mpanyimfo wɔ asɔr nyina mu
column3: na wodzii mbuada yɛɛ asɔr no
column4: wɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ Ewuradze a wɔgyee no dzii no ne nsa."

column2: "Na wotwaa mu wɔ Pisidia no
column3: wɔbaa Pamfilia."

column2: "Na wɔkaa asɛm no wɔ Perga no
column3: wosianee bodur Atalia;"

column2: "ofi hɔ na wɔfaa nsuenyi baa Antiok mbrɛ wɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ Nyankopɔn adom nsa maa edwuma a woekowie dzi no."
"Na wɔbae no
column3: wɔfrɛfrɛɛ asɔrmba no boaa ano
column4: na wɔkaa dza Nyankopɔn dze hɔn akɛyɛ nyina
column5: na mbrɛ oebue gyedzi abow no ama amanamamfo no."

column2: "Na wɔnye esuafo no tsenaa hɔ ma ɔkyɛree."
